info.name: wiki.ubuntu.com width
info.description: Sets width of wiki.ubuntu.com to a value that is useful for half-tiling your browser window.

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("wiki.ubuntu.com") {                       
#container {                                                     
    width: 100%;                                                 
    margin: 0;                                                   
}                                                                
#wrapper {                                                       
    width: 100%;                                                 
}                                                                
#footer {                                                        
    width: 10;                                                   
}                                                                
body {                                                           
    width: 100%;                                                 
    max-width: 700px;                                            
    margin-left: auto;                                           
    margin-right: auto;                                          
}                                                                
                                                                 
}
